Wreath laid before Kim Jong Suk's bust 
    Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The military attaches' corps here yesterday laid a wreath before the bust of the great communist revolutionary fighter Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs' Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and observed a moment's silence in her memory on the occasion of her 83rd birth anniversary.
